name: A Final Meeting
description:
A short game I did in the style of a O2A2 game (Only One of Any Asset). This was not a submission for the 2022 O2A2 VN Jam, but something I simply decided to do for fun and as a personal challenge.

This game is set in the universe of a private story, but can be played as a standalone experience. Llito Loc (pronounced Tee-Et-O Lock) uses They/Them pronouns.

FEATURES

  • 1 sprite
  • 1 background
  • 1 illustration
  • 1 song
  • 1 sound effect
  • 1k words

(Important Warnings: Mentions of implied abuse, blood, and drowning. Whilst set in Purgatory, there are no strong religious themes.)
